Night Shift falls back along with Rattrap who both have the same thought in=
 mind.  Better to be cautious, rather than just throw themselves into a bat=
tle that wasn't theirs.  Yet they knew that they had to still rescue Cheeto=
r, and that was their main focus.  Night Shift and Rattrap crouch low to th=
e ground, behind vegitation to avoid being seen.

" Slag, we got serious wa=
rfare gon' on ahead of us, and I know what's gonna happen when we get movn'=
.  Them ben' some sort of Insecticon species, they're really gonna pick up =
on me.  I highly doubt an Autobot's gonna be able ta go un noticed around t=
hose guys, but you might be able ta slip past 'em Rattrap."

Rattrap swallo=
ws hard.

"Umm, I suppose there's no go'n back now is there?"

Night Shift =
puts a hand on his shoulder.

"Believe me, if there was, I'd be there right=
 with ya.  But we gotta do this for Cheetor."

Rattrap nodds, and gets into=
 his beast mode.

"I suppose if I stay real low ta the ground'n under the b=
rush, I should be okay.  I'll keep my com link open.  You on the other hand=
, maybe it's not such a bad idea that ya get back inta your wheels.  Ya mig=
ht need 'em for a fast getaway."

Night Shift nodds and transforms into veh=
icle mode, backing into a thick area of dense vegitation.

"I'll stay here,=
 headlights off.  If ya need help, com link me and I'll show ya where I am.=
"

Rattrap nodds and then scrambles beneath the brush, continuing forward w=
ithout Night Shift.  

The tiny rodent continues on his way.  He keeps quie=
t and uses his nose and ears to direct him toward the source of the fire bl=
asts.  He hoped he could at least see if Cheetor was anywhere close by.  Bu=
t like everything else, it would be a shot in the dark.
